title: ECNEC approves 12 projects worth Rs 380 bn
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 15 (APP): The Executive Committee of the National Economic Council (ECNEC) on Wednesday approved 12 development projects worth over Rs 380 billion. The meeting of the committee was held here under the chairmanship of Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar.
The projects span agriculture, education, health, infrastructure, and climate resilience – covering Punjab, Sindh, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Balochistan and Gilgit Baltistan.
During the meeting, the deputy PM reaffirmed the government’s commitment to inclusive and sustainable national development.
The meeting was attended by the Minister for Planning, Senior Minister of Punjab, Sindh’s Minister for Irrigation & Food, KPK’s Advisor on Finance, Chief Secretary GB, Federal Secretaries Cabinet, Planning, and senior officials from Finance, Energy and concerned federal & provincial departments.
